page.title: 15Recreation Warstones Library
page.content: Warstone's library was opened in 1976. The library is in Pinfold Grove just off Warstones Drive. Behind it is a small stream which is used to drain storm water off Warstones Road. Opposite the library are the local shops. In the entrance area there is a showcase with books and photographs. As you go into the library there is a large desk where you receive your tickets and get your books stamped. To your left is the childrens section where there are 6,596 younger peoples' books. The adults section has 17,656 books. The library lends an average of 4000 books a week and has 6,156 borrowers. It has a Micro Fiche computer which will display book and authors on micro film. 7 people work at the library, four full time and three part time. It opens every day except on a Sunday.
